description: An intelligent multi-agent system that generates personalized, health-aware diet plans. It takes user input such as calorie goals, dietary preferences, and health conditions, then plans optimized daily meals using reasoning, RAG retrieval, and fine-tuned models. The system includes interactive coaching, real-time nutrition lookup, and progress visualization.

agents.name: User Interaction Agent
agents.function: Handles conversation with the user. Collects inputs like age, weight, goal, and preferences, and manages dialogue context.
agents.input: Natural language or structured text input

agents.name: Planner Agent
agents.function: Calculates calorie distribution across meals based on user's goal (e.g., 25% breakfast, 35% lunch, etc.) and decides meal structure.

agents.name: Nutritionist Agent
agents.function: Generates meal options based on dietary preference and calorie targets using a fine-tuned LoRA model and RAG-based nutrition lookup.

agents.name: RAG Retriever Agent
agents.function: Retrieves verified nutritional information from databases (e.g., USDA, OpenFoodFacts) using ChromaDB or FAISS embeddings.

agents.name: Optimizer Agent
agents.function: Optimizes meal composition using calorie and macronutrient balance (via Linear Programming or Reinforcement Learning).

agents.name: Evaluator Agent
agents.function: Evaluates diet plan quality using metrics like calorie accuracy, diversity, and nutrient coverage. Flags imbalance or unsafe suggestions.

agents.name: Coach Agent
agents.function: Engages the user daily with motivational feedback, adaptive advice, and logs user preferences for future personalization.

architecture.flow: User Interaction → Planner → Nutritionist + RAG Retriever → Optimizer → Evaluator → Coach → Dashboard

storage.logs: User feedback and daily summaries stored as JSON

dataset.source: Synthetic + open datasets (Indian Food Calorie Dataset, Food.com Recipes, Nutritionix)

format.output: Breakfast: Oats with banana... Lunch: Brown rice with lentils...

features: Daily diet plan visualization with calorie charts (Plotly)

optimization_module.objective: Minimize deviation from target calories while maximizing variety and nutrition

rag_module.description: Retrieval-Augmented Generation system that grounds food recommendations with verified nutrition data.

example_prompt.task: Generate a 1-day vegetarian meal plan for weight loss with 1800 kcal target

deliverables: Source code of the advanced multi-agent prototype
RAG retrieval and optimization module documentation
Interaction logs with prompts and responses
Streamlit dashboard screenshots or demo video
